title: Looking for someone to play twitch ADC in a protect the twitch team comp
body:
I was playing the twitch ADC role since season 4 and I am looking to switch it up.

So I need someone who is willing to play twitch.

ign: transcender

replies.body: Id be down to play twitch add IM BoxxY

yeah. I would be getting you to build bloodthirster > runaans > ie > botrk > LDR > PD (situational)

so you would have to confirm if you are willing to do that otherwise we are just wasting each others time.
